name: Short Sword
description: A simple sword. It doesn't look very sharp...

name: Axe of Storms
description: A one handed axe, marked with runes. It hums with magic.

name: Minor Healing Potion
description: A healing draught with a bitter taste.

name: Manaweave Robe
description: A glimmering robe of fine cloth.

name: Thorium Armor
description: Nearly impenetrable plate armor of dwarven make.

name: Sturdy Recurve Bow
description: A sturdy bow fashioned from yew.
